nodes.text: Delrice Capreese was a female Ithorian spice trading specialist that lived during the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, Lady Valarian brought Capreese to Tatooine to help in her attempts to compete with Jabba the Hutt's crime organization. Circa 1 ABY, Jabba ordered a spacer to eliminate Capreese to disrupt Lady Valarian's efforts.

Delrice Capreese is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. She is part of Jabba's Theme Park, a series of quests wherein the player works for Jabba the Hutt's organization. One of the missions from Jabba himself asks the player to kill Capreese.
